hero.core_tension: Choose whether the extra dollar preserves margin by targeting top loyalty members or buys reach via collab/retail media during the early holiday window.
hero.setting: Back-office strategy table in a quiet store mezzanine. Three matte cards fanned on the table read Loyalty, Retail Media, Collab. Composition cues: 3/4 overhead angle, operator framed center, materials: matte paper cards, glass tablet edge, concrete tabletop.
hero.action: Deliberately presses a single card labeled "$1 credit — top decile" into a launch position while glancing at a printed matched-collab plan.
hero.urgency_symbol: A narrowing band of light across the cards that visually mimics a closing window.
props: Matte campaign cards for Loyalty / Retail Media / Collab
Small store counter placard referencing Nov 18–Dec 02 window
hero.lighting: Polished editorial: confident highlights on the chosen card, soft shadow on alternatives to emphasize decision.
hero.alt: Head of Retail choosing $1 loyalty credit for Nov18–Dec02 pilot; launching test

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings with inner loyalty core, middle retail media band, outer collab reach lattice. Quant anchors placed in ring segments: inner ring annotated 12–15% current early-window share, goal 20–30%; outer arc labels footfall uplift base 10–15% and stretch ≥25%. Composition cues: isometric view, textured paper material for rings.
elements: Tokens representing sample shoppers clustered toward the loyalty core
Arcs showing flow of new buyers from collab into capture mechanics
Annotated quant anchors (percent ranges, CPA ceiling) embedded in geometry
signal_map.motion: Flow lines move inward from collab lattice through retail media into loyalty core to show trial converting to repeat when capture mechanics are present.
signal_map.palette: Neutral base with three confident accents: loyalty teal, media amber, collab indigo; paper and matte metal textures.
signal_map.alt: CMO mapping early-window share vs event CPA; comparing $1 loyalty credit, retail media, collab reach

case_studies.scene: Quiet store planning huddle where a retail manager and Head of Partnerships pin a localized $1 credit card to a rack labeled Top Decile Offers. Composition cues: eye-level angle on hands pinning the card, materials: linen reminder cards and metallic binder clips.
case_studies.moment: Operator hands a sealed $1-targeted insert to a store lead and points to the in-store capture checklist that ties redemptions to margin-per-visit metrics.
props: In-store capture checklist printed on cardstock
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial light with a focused highlight on the pinned card and checklist.
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships deploying $1 loyalty credit; measuring visits and conversion

case_studies.scene: Store-as-studio activation: Partnerships lead and a store manager inspect a co-branded shelf vignette for a collab SKU. Composition cues: low angle to emphasize display, materials: glossy collab pack, matte sampling tray, printed QR panel.
case_studies.moment: The Partnerships lead gestures to a paper QR capture panel on the display while a store associate practices scanning workflow for instant in-store capture.
props: Sampling tray and brief for in-store capture mechanics
case_studies.lighting: Polished, high-contrast rim light on the collab pack to signal trial focus.
case_studies.alt: Partnerships Lead running collab SKU with in-store QR capture; tracking redemptions and CPA
